subtitle: Securely share and view NuAeS
encryption-steps:
To encrypt your NuAeS, upload them through the "Select media" field in the "Encryption" card
Enter a secret word in the "Secret word" field.
The word must be one that only you and your recipient know.
Do not send your secret word over the Internet!
Agree with the recipient on a word that only you know together.
For example, the nickname of your mother's boa constrictor.
You can store the word in the browser's memory, but it's not safe!

Click on the "Encrypt" button
Download the archive using the "Download" button in the "Encryption" card
Send it to your recipient
decryption-steps:
To decrypt your NuAeS, upload the archive through the "Upload Encrypted Archive" field in the "Decryption" card
Enter a secret word in the "Secret word" field
Click on the "Decrypt" button
🤩🤩🤩Enjoy NuAeS🤩🤩🤩
You can download them one by one or as an archive. But keep in mind that this is already an unsafe way to store it!
description:
Your NuAeS are protected by AES encryption. The service does not send any requests at all, and naturally does not store your files anywhere. Honestly!
